Item.Name: Ether
Item.Effect: When used from the Bag on a Pokémon, it fully restores 10 PP for one of its moves.
Item.Description: This medicine can restore 10 PP to a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokémon.

Item.Name: Max Ether
Item.Effect: When used from the Bag on a Pokémon, it fully restores the PP of one of its moves.
Item.Description: This medicine can fully restore the PP of a single selected move that has been learned by a Pokémon.

Item.Name: Elixir
Item.Effect: When used from the Bag on a Pokémon, it restores 10 PP to all of its moves.
Item.Description: This medicine can restore 10 PP to each of the moves that have been learned by a Pokémon.

Item.Name: Max Elixir
Item.Effect: When used from the Bag on a Pokémon, it fully restores the PP of all of its moves.
Item.Description: This medicine can fully restore the PP of all of the moves that have been learned by a Pokémon.
